title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Evidence-Based Instructional Design for Postpartum Hemorrhage Response Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Identify three initial symptoms of postpartum hemorrhage with over 90% accuracy
Complete postpartum hemorrhage response procedures within 15 minutes according to evidence-based protocols
Reduce decision-making error rates to below 20% in team-based simulations
Over 80% of participants apply acquired skills within three months in actual clinical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
